title: Truffle Gnocchi with green beans, egg and roast
directions: Bring a pan of water to the boil. Put the eggs in and cook for 5 minutes. Then the protein is coagulated and the yolk still soft. Take with a slotted spoon and drain the water in the pan. Rinse under cold running water and peel them. Meanwhile, remove the stalk of the green beans and cook 4 min. In the pan with the water from the eggs. Drain and drain well.

Heat 2 tbsp oil in a frying pan and cook the gnocchi, tarragon, pepper and salt 8 min. On medium heat. Stir frequently. Meanwhile, cut the onion into rings and knofook fine. Heat the remaining oil in a frying pan and fry the onion and garlic for 2 minutes. Add the green beans, pepper and salt and cook 3 min. On medium heat.
Mix the tapenade by haricots verts and divide among 4 plates. Spoon the gnocchi it and divide the roast on top. Put the eggs and cut them in, so the yolk runs out. Sprinkle with pepper.
